items.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 50 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target. A creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage each time it ends its turn grappled by the roper.

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) fire damage.
